price: Whatever they used to supplicate before will vanish from them, and they will realize that they have no escape.
arabic: وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَدۡعُونَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَظَنُّواْ مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
